turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you have a location in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you do the one in on Limekiln Pike in Dresher, Pennsylvania?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can't seem to find it, can you give me the city one more time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Dresher, Pennsylvania. d r e s h e r, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I found a location on 1401 Virginia Dr, does that sound right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, what can i get you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! did you want it hot or iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, and any preferences on the type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could I please have nonfat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add whip creaM?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and did you also want the drizzle on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. anything else you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so i got a Grande, gingerbread latte, nonfat with light whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! give me a moment to send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much for your help.
